data_umap<- params$x4 %>% bind_rows()
# Plot
plot_tissue_color =
    data_umap |>
    dplyr::mutate(batch = 1) |>
    ggplot(aes(umap_1, umap_2, color = data_umap[[x5]])) +  # Ensure 'Tissue' is a column in 'data_umap'
    geom_point(size = 0.2) +
    facet_wrap(~data_umap[[x5]]) +
    theme_minimal() +
    labs(title = "UMAP colored by Tissue", color = "data_umap[[x5]]")
